question: Two stones begin to fall from rest from the same height, with the second stone starting to fall $\Delta t$ seconds after the first falls from rest. The distance of separation between the two stones becomes ‘H’, ‘$t_0$’ seconds after the first stone starts its motion. Then $t_0$ is equal to
choices: $\frac{H}{g \Delta t} + \frac{\Delta t}{2}$ (Assume different option or format)
